alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 2:05PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Surf through Saturday... Across the West Coast with the the low moving toward the Yukon Delta the winds will be offshore for many of the areas extending from Nome through Hooper Bay. As the low moves toward Yukon Delta on Friday into Saturday there will be elevated surf along the northern side of St Lawrence Island with wave action 1 to 2 feet above the normal high tide line during high tides. Minor beach erosion may occur in areas along the coastline. Winds will also shift to northerly direction over St Lawerence Island with winds of 20 to 35 mph and gusts up to 40 mph. For the latest forecasts go to www.weather.gov/fairbanks.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
